snippet: Dwyane Wade plans to return to the Miami lineup Friday against Boston, after missing six straight games because of soreness in his right knee.
abstract: Miami Heat shooting guard Dwyane Wade plans to return to lineup, after missing six straight games because of soreness in his right knee; other NBA developments noted.
lead_paragraph: Dwyane Wade plans to return to the Miami lineup Friday against Boston, after missing six straight games because of soreness in his right knee.

headline.seo: Heat’s Dwyane Wade Plans Return Against Boston
headline.main: Heat’s Wade Plans Return Against Boston
